      • getItem

        public Item getItem(int index)
        Returns an item from the inventory of the player.
        Parameters:
        index - the index of the item in the inventory of the player.
        Returns:
        the item at the specified index if it is correct, null if the index is not valid.

      • getItem

        public Item getItem(java.lang.String name)
        Returns an item from the inventory of the player.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the item.
        Returns:
        the first occurrence of an item in the inventory having the same name as the one specified, null if there is no match.
